short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Heartbeat.chat community users and extract all community members' email, LinkedIn profile and social media to CSV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scrape and Extract Heartbeat.chat community member list to CSV / Excel / JSON.
Acquire target users from competitor communities, Get target propects' emails, LinkedIn profiles, and social media info for easy outreach.

HOW TO USE?
1. Open a community powered by Heartbeat.chat. make sure you have join the community.
2. Click the Export Members button

EXPORT FIELDS
#full_name, #first_name, #last_name, #bio, #role_name, #email, #linkedin_profile, #twitter, #instagram, #personal_website, #calendar, #avatar, #account_status, #is_ghost_user, #createdAt
